caption:
You’re going to hear a lot about recessions over the next few weeks, so in this video, I’m going to break down the four key components you need to track to know whether we’re technically in a recession or not.

This is a snippet from my weekly video newsletter for private community members. If you’d like to join, just send me a DM.

Every week, I cover this stuff for you — explain what to watch, how to track it, and most importantly, what it actually means for the markets. 

I do all the heavy lifting so you don’t have to. Just watch the videos and stay ahead.

Link’s in the bio, or feel free to send me a message if you’re interested.
